sentence.Network_en: "I don't know," Pollard replied, professing innocence.
sentence.Network_cn: “我不知道，”波拉德回答说，谎称自己是无辜的。

sentence.Network_en: But ( which becometh women professing godliness ) with good works.
sentence.Network_cn: 只要有善行.这才与自称是敬神的女人相宜.

sentence.Network_en: Professing Christianity, he had little compassion in his make - up.
sentence.Network_cn: 他号称信奉基督教, 却没有什么慈悲心肠.

PerfectNetExp.abs: The Jews stood forth distinct all other nations , professing allegiance to God ., 犹太人与列国截然不同 , 他们自称效忠于上帝.

he is professing history .他在教授历史.
Live truth instead of professing it ., 以活出真理来代替传讲真理.

entry.def: If you profess to do or have something, you claim that you do it or have it, often when you do not.

example.ex: She professed to hate her nickname...
example.tran: 她自称痛恨自己的外号。

example.ex: Why do organisations profess that they care?...
example.tran: 为什么机构都谎称自己对此很关心？

entry.tran: 表达，表明（感情、观点、信仰等）
entry.def: If you profess a feeling, opinion, or belief, you express it.

example.ex: He professed to be content with the arrangement...
example.tran: 他对这个安排表示满意。

example.ex: Bacher professed himself pleased with the Indian tour.
example.tran: 巴奇尔表示对印度之行很满意。

means.word_mean: 1. an open avowal (true or false) of some belief or opinion;

auth_sentence.content: But this is not the god the theologians of religions are professing.
auth_sentence.res_content: But this is not the god the theologians of religions are professing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But this is not the god the theologians of religions are professing.

auth_sentence.content: In attempting to discredit hard facts and professing yourself wiser than I, you have proven yourself incredible.
auth_sentence.res_content: In attempting to discredit hard facts and professing yourself wiser than I, you have proven yourself incredible.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In attempting to discredit hard facts and professing yourself wiser than I, you have proven yourself incredible.

auth_sentence.content: When the underlings of the underlings start professing to be depressed, the work force will be no place to be.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: When the underlings of the underlings start professing to be depressed, the work force will be no place to be.
